bill_title: revise certain provisions contained in Senate Bill 209, the General Appropriations Act, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 2007, as previously enacted by the Eighty-first Session of the South Dakota Legislature.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions contained in Senate Bill 209, the General Appropriations Act, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 2007, as previously enacted by the Eighty-first Session of the South Dakota Legislature. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 26 of the 2006 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 34A. As soon as estimates are available but in no event later than June 30, 2007, the state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund from the property tax reduction fund all revenues collected and distributed pursuant to § 10-50-52 during the fiscal year ending June 30, 2007. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
